Text: Thank You Mr LayMr Lay For the past days I have been on a medical mission trip to Honduras five of which werent scheduled but were necessary because Continental canceled flights in light of our nations tragedy Although Honduras is a third world country and very little American news makes it there I was told that Enron had donated million dollars to the Red Cross and was matching employee donations to in response to the terrorist attacks on our Country Mr Lay it made me even more proud to work for this company and to work for you I cant tell you what an honor it is to work for this company and for you you hear countless stories of what you and Enron have done for our community Sincerely Josh Duncan
